data: {"generalSituation":"The easterly airstream will bring relatively humid weather to the coast of southern China in the next couple of days. It will be warm during the day over the region. A trough of low pressure is expected to affect southern China in the latter part of this week to early next week. There will be occasional showers and isolated thunderstorms over the region. Under the influence of the northeast monsoon, there will still be a few rain patches over southern China early to midweek next week and temperatures will fall slightly.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260224","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"East force 3 to 4, force 5 at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. Visibility rather low in some areas with one or two rain patches in the morning.
